comments:
I've installed Lomboz (	lomboz.3m6.zip) plugin from
http://www.objectlearn.com/index.jsp by unzipping the archive to eclipse/ 
it created two directories under plugins-directory. After awhile i decided to
uninstall the pluging by removing the two created directories under plugins.
However, after the removal eclipse refused to start. 
Here's what's found from workspace/.metadata/.log

plugins at the same time. Now i cannot restart Eclipse anymore.
